name: Hive Divers
description:
Hive Divers (Alpha-ish)

Been working on this for around 2 years in my spare time.  I really enjoy games like Enter the Gungeon, Risk of Rain, so I decided to try and make a similar game with some twists. 

Basic concept - Is you're a hive diver and you dive down into ground killing bugs. There is an Overmap where you can choose which path to go to get to the boss. (Very similar to slay the spire). Each character has weapon choices as you go through the game. You can build your character differently every time you play. You can also level up guns/weapons by using them on enemies. You can also level each character and that level that persists. These levels unlock adding starting passives and very small stat bonus's based on the character. Also Dodging has I-Frames very similar to ETG.

Note: All the art is placeholder art. Haven't really figured out what art style to use yet.  Looking for some feed back, constructive criticism is welcome. If you are interested in helping out please feel free to contact me.

Controls ( You can change these, No joystick support yet ):

  • W,A,S,D move
  • Dodge (Space while moving)
  • Shoot (Mouse 1)
  • Reload (R)
  • Ability 1 (Q)
  • Ability 2 (E)
  • Ability 3 (Left Shift)
  • Inventory (I)

Current Content:

  • 2 Playable Characters
  • 2 Bosses
  • 30 Levels
  • Player Levels and Passives saved for next run
  • ~30 different weapons
  • ~30 different enemy types
  • ~30 different passives
  • ~10 different abilities
  • Randomly generated Overmap
  • Randomly generated enemy groups to fight
  • Online Co-op up to 4 players ( 3 Servers US East, US West, Europe )
